segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman carefully drying a plate, looking so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, with neat bushes lining the path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sink is running, but she's not paying attention to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is starting to overflow onto the floor, forming a little puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar, grabbing some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks a bit wobbly, but he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing there, reaching up with her hand open, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how they're sharing this sneaky moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, and everything seems so domestic and lively.
segments.speaker: PAR
